channel.title: CVE Feed for SKT Themes -- SKT Skill Bar
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SKT Themes -- SKT Skill Bar

item.title: CVE-2024-38698|2024-08-02T04:19:19.260Z -- skt%20themes -- skt%20skill%20bar
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in SKT Themes SKT Skill Bar allows Stored XSS.This issue affects SKT Skill Bar: from n/a through 2.0.
